mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT RL.MEMBER_NO FROM RECIPE_LIKE RL JOIN RECIPE R USING(RECIPE_NO) WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} UNION SELECT BL.MEMBER_NO FROM BOARD_LIKE BL JOIN BOARD B USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE_BOOKMARK JOIN RECIPE R USING(RECIPE_NO) WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "RECIPE" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND RECIPE_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT * FROM RECIPE_COMMENT UNION SELECT * FROM BOARD_COMMENT) WHERE RECIPE_COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT RECIPE_TAG_NAME FROM "RECIPE_TAG" WHERE RECIPE_NO = #{recipeNo}
SELECT ROUND(AVG(RECIPE_STAR), 1) RECIPE_STAR FROM RECIPE_STAR WHERE RECIPE_NO = #{recipeNo}

SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PROFILE, TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_AUTHORITY, MEMBER_INTRO, MEMBER_NO FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "RECIPE_BOOKMARK" RL JOIN "RECIPE" USING(RECIPE_NO) WHERE RL.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND RECIPE_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT R.RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE_THUMBNAIL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE_LIKE RL WHERE RL.RECIPE_NO = R.RECIPE_NO) RECIPE_LIKE, RECIPE_HITS, MEMBER_NICKNAME, R.MEMBER_NO FROM RECIPE R JOIN RECIPE_BOOKMARK RB ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RB.RECIPE_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO) WHERE RB.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND RECIPE_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_ENROLL_DATE, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_CODE, BOARD_HITS, MEMBER_NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_LIKE BL WHERE BL.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) BOARD_LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE_THUMBNAIL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE_LIKE RL WHERE RL.RECIPE_NO = R.RECIPE_NO) RECIPE_LIKE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NO, RECIPE_HITS FROM RECIPE R JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND RECIPE_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY RECIPE_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}
SELECT MEMBER_PW FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT R.RECIPE_NO) FROM "RECIPE" R LEFT JOIN RECIPE_TAG RT ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RT.RECIPE_NO) LEFT JOIN RECIPE_STEP RS ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RS.RECIPE_NO) LEFT JOIN RECIPE_MATERIAL RM ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RM.RECIPE_NO) LEFT JOIN MATERIAL M ON(M.MATERIAL_NO = RM.MATERIAL_NO) WHERE (RECIPE_TITLE LIKE '%${inputSearch}%' OR RECIPE_INTRO LIKE '%${inputSearch}%' OR RECIPE_TIP LIKE '%${inputSearch}%' OR RECIPE_TAG_NAME LIKE '%${inputSearch}%' OR RECIPE_STEP_CONTENT LIKE '%${inputSearch}%' OR MATERIAL_NAME LIKE '%${inputSearch}%') AND RECIPE_DEL_FL = 'N' AND R.RECIPE_NO IN(SELECT RECIPE_NO FROM RECIPE_BOOKMARK WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo})

SELECT DISTINCT R.RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE_THUMBNAIL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE_LIKE RL WHERE RL.RECIPE_NO = R.RECIPE_NO) RECIPE_LIKE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NO, RECIPE_HITS, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(RECIPE_STAR), 1) RECIPE_STAR FROM RECIPE_STAR RST WHERE RST.RECIPE_NO = R.RECIPE_NO) RECIPE_STAR FROM "RECIPE" R LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN RECIPE_TAG RT ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RT.RECIPE_NO) LEFT JOIN RECIPE_STEP RS ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RS.RECIPE_NO) LEFT JOIN RECIPE_MATERIAL RM ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RM.RECIPE_NO) LEFT JOIN MATERIAL M ON(M.MATERIAL_NO = RM.MATERIAL_NO) WHERE (RECIPE_TITLE LIKE '%${inputSearch}%' OR RECIPE_INTRO LIKE '%${inputSearch}%' OR RECIPE_TIP LIKE '%${inputSearch}%' OR RECIPE_TAG_NAME LIKE '%${inputSearch}%' OR RECIPE_STEP_CONTENT LIKE '%${inputSearch}%' OR MATERIAL_NAME LIKE '%${inputSearch}%') AND RECIPE_DEL_FL = 'N' AND R.RECIPE_NO IN(SELECT RECIPE_NO FROM RECIPE_BOOKMARK WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo})
ORDER BY RECIPE_LIKE DESC
ORDER BY RECIPE_STAR DESC
ORDER BY RECIPE_NO DESC
ORDER BY RECIPE_HITS DESC
NULLS LAST
